The Ghost Of 
      David Coffin
Tuesday, June 19, at 10 p.m. 
      ET/PT
 
When a rich, young 
      Atlanta businessman 
      named David Coffin was murdered, almost all the evidence was destroyed in 
      a massive fire. His girlfriend, Megan Lee, was 
      devastated.
 
Suspicion quickly fell on Scott 
      Davis, who just happened to be Megan’s estranged 
      husband.
 
But with so little hard 
      evidence, it would take a decade to get to the bottom of it all. And 
      before it was over, the suspected killer would run for governor of 
      California!
 
Correspondent Maureen 
      Maher reports 
      for 48 Hours 
      Mystery, tonight at 
      10 p.m. ET/PT.
 
Watch Maher's reporter's notebook.
